author: jochembrouwer
content:
A small note regarding the output validation: the order of the access list entries should not matter (in the JSON) ðŸ™‚ (Hope I interpreted this diff correctly ðŸ™‚ )
https://hive.pectra-devnet-5.ethpandaops.io/suite.html?suiteid=1738016875-368618476121dd34f68670d0d5da257f.json&suitename=rpc-compat#test-22

author: jochembrouwer
content:
The JSON check seems to be rather strict:
`diffStatus, diffText := jsondiff.Compare([]byte(resp), []byte(expectedData), opts)`

Where `jsondiff` = `"github.com/nsf/jsondiff"`. I think in this case, the order of the access list storage items is optional. (But no obvious way to program this, otherwise I'd have created a PR ðŸ™‚ )

author: pnowosie
content:
